data.title: Erika Stuber
data.meta_description: 1943 - Erika Stuber - 2022 Erika Stuber of Orion, passed away on Monday, June 13, 2022, at the age of 78 years...
data.text:
Posted Jun 14, 2022 | 3:38 PM by PattFH

1943 – Erika Stuber – 2022

Erika Stuber of Orion, passed away on Monday, June 13, 2022, at the age of 78 years, beloved wife of the late Johnny Stuber. She leaves to cherish her memory three daughters Debbie (Joe) Weisgerber, Penny (Ken) Shearer and Lorrie (Rob) Berger; six grandchildren, Amanda (Ty), Blake (Morgan), Kayleen (Kevin) and their children Bentley, Bella and Bliss; Stephanie (Jesse) and their daughter Emmie; Jessica (Justin) and their son Hayden; Cole (Madisen); one brother Werner (Gloria) Jetter and one sister Rose (Sam) Ivanitz. She was predeceased by her husband Johnny on March 7, 1994 and by her parents Pauline and Jakob Jetter. Family and friends who wish to pay their respects may do so at the PATTISON FUNERAL HOME on Thursday from 12:30 – 1:25 p.m. The funeral service will be held in the PATTISON CHAPEL on Thursday, June 16, 2022 at 1:30 p.m. with Life Celebrant, David Townsend. The service will be live streamed, and family and friends who are unable to attend are invited to watch the service by searching for the Pattison Funeral Home Youtube page. The video will go live 10 minutes prior to service time and will remain on the Youtube page for future viewing. A private interment will follow in the Hillside Cemetery. Those who wish to remember Erika Stuber with a donation, may do so to the charity of your choice. To e-mail an expression of sympathy, please direct it to: office@pattisonfuneralhome.com subject heading: Erika Stuber, or you may visit www.pattisonfuneralhome.com and leave a message of condolence.

Location : Medicine Hat, Alberta
